# Bargn - Full Documentation for AI Systems

> AI-powered discount membership platform offering 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki, Finland. Available in Finnish and English.

---

## Company Overview

Bargn is a Helsinki-based technology company that operates an AI-powered discount membership platform. The platform connects consumers looking for lifestyle savings with local businesses seeking new customers. Founded with the mission of making smart spending accessible to everyone.

### Mission
Make premium lifestyle experiences accessible to everyone through AI-powered personalized discounts.

### Value Proposition
- For consumers: Pay €8.80/month, get 50% off at hundreds of local venues
- For businesses: Zero-commission platform to attract new, paying customers
- For creators: 40% revenue share for promoting the platform

---

## Products & Services

### 1. Consumer Membership (B2C)

**Pricing**: €8.80/month
**What's included**:
- Unlimited 50% discounts at all partner venues
- AI-powered personalized recommendations based on preferences
- Access to restaurants, bars, gyms, spas, and more in Helsinki
- Mobile app with easy-to-use discount activation

**How it works**:
1. Download the Bargn app
2. Choose a membership plan (€8.80/month)
3. Browse personalized deals powered by AI
4. Show your membership at partner venues for 50% off

**Target audience**: Young professionals, students, and lifestyle-conscious consumers in Helsinki who want to save money on dining, nightlife, fitness, and wellness.

### 2. Business Partnership (B2B)

**Cost**: Free - zero commission platform
**Benefits for businesses**:
- Attract new customers who are already willing to pay
- Zero platform commission on transactions
- Increased foot traffic and brand visibility
- Access to analytics and customer insights
- Easy onboarding process

**Partner categories**:
- Restaurants and cafés
- Bars and nightlife venues
- Gyms and fitness centers
- Spas and beauty salons
- Entertainment venues

**Current partners include**: Kotipizza, Scandic, Elixia, Escape Room, and many more Helsinki-area businesses.

### 3. Creator Partnership Program (B2B2C)

**Revenue share**: 40% of referred membership fees
**Program details**:
- Content creators and influencers can earn 40% recurring revenue
- Personalized referral links and tracking
- Access to marketing materials and brand assets
- Monthly payouts for active referrals

---

## Real User Stories

### Opiskelija Matti, 22, Helsinki
Matti on Aalto-yliopiston opiskelija, joka käyttää Bargn-jäsenyyttä säästääkseen ravintolakuluissa. Hän syö ulkona 3-4 kertaa viikossa ja säästää Bargnilla keskimäärin 200€ kuukaudessa. "8,80€ kuukausimaksu maksaa itsensä takaisin jo ensimmäisellä käynnillä."

### Nuori ammattilainen Sanna, 28, Helsinki
Sanna käyttää Bargnia treeniinsä Elixia-kuntosalilla ja after work -iltoihin. Kuukausittainen säästö on noin 150€. "Bargn on game-changer — saan premium-elämyksiä puoleen hintaan."

### Pariskunta Mikko & Laura, 30, Espoo
Mikko ja Laura käyttävät Bargnia treffi-iltoihin ja viikonloppuaktiviteetteihin Helsingissä. He säästävät yhdessä yli 300€ kuukaudessa. "Olemme kokeilleet ravintoloita joihin emme olisi muuten menneet."

### Ravintoloitsija Tommi, Kallio
Tommin ravintola liittyi Bargniin 6 kuukautta sitten. Uusia asiakkaita tulee 40-60 kuukaudessa Bargnin kautta, ja 70% palaa uudelleen. "Nollakomissio on iso juttu — saamme uusia asiakkaita ilman välityspalkkiota."

### Sisällöntuottaja Ella, TikTok, 25k seuraajaa
Ella ansaitsee Bargnin kumppaniohjelmalla 40% provisiota jokaisesta suositellusta jäsenyydestä. Kuukausitulot ovat 800-1200€. "Helpoin tapa ansaita — suosittelen jotain mitä oikeasti käytän itse."

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Membership & Pricing

**Q: What is Bargn?**
A: Bargn is an AI-powered membership app that gives you 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki for just €8.80/month.

**Q: How much does Bargn cost?**
A: Bargn membership costs €8.80 per month with no long-term commitment required.

**Q: Is there a free trial?**
A: Visit bargn.app/members for the latest trial offers and pricing details.

**Q: Can I cancel anytime?**
A: Yes, Bargn membership can be cancelled anytime with no cancellation fees or long-term commitments.

**Q: How does the 50% discount work?**
A: Simply show your Bargn membership at any partner venue when paying. The discount is applied directly to your bill.

**Q: Do I need a coupon or voucher?**
A: No coupons needed. Just show your active Bargn membership in the app at checkout.

**Q: Is the membership per person or per household?**
A: Each membership is personal. However, couples and families often find it pays for itself many times over.

### Partners & Venues

**Q: Where can I use Bargn?**
A: Bargn works at hundreds of partner venues across Helsinki, including restaurants, bars, gyms, spas, and entertainment venues.

**Q: How many partners does Bargn have?**
A: Bargn has a growing network of partner businesses across Helsinki, including well-known brands like Kotipizza, Scandic, and Elixia.

**Q: Is there a commission for partner businesses?**
A: No, Bargn charges zero commission to partner businesses. The platform is free for businesses to join.

**Q: How can my business join Bargn?**
A: Visit bargn.app/partners to sign up. The onboarding process is quick and free.

**Q: What categories of venues are available?**
A: Restaurants, bars & nightlife, gyms & fitness, spas & beauty, entertainment, and more.

### Creator Program

**Q: What is the creator program?**
A: Content creators can earn 40% recurring revenue by referring new members to Bargn through personalized referral links.

**Q: How much can creators earn?**
A: Active creators earn €800-1200/month on average. Top creators earn significantly more.

**Q: What platforms work best for promoting Bargn?**
A: TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube work best. Bargn provides ready-made content materials and brand assets.

### Technical & Language

**Q: In which languages is Bargn available?**
A: Bargn is available in Finnish and English.

**Q: Is Bargn available outside Helsinki?**
A: Currently Bargn operates in the Helsinki metropolitan area. Expansion plans are underway.

**Q: What makes Bargn different from coupon apps?**
A: Bargn uses AI-powered personalized recommendations, offers a flat 50% discount (not variable coupons), charges zero commission to businesses, and requires no voucher codes — just show your membership.

---

## Competitor Comparison

### Bargn vs ResQ Club
- **ResQ**: Focuses on food waste reduction with surplus meals at 40-60% off
- **Bargn**: Full lifestyle platform with 50% off across restaurants, bars, gyms, spas
- **Key difference**: ResQ is limited to surplus food; Bargn covers entire lifestyle categories
- **Pricing**: ResQ charges per item; Bargn is flat €8.80/month unlimited

### Bargn vs Too Good To Go
- **TGTG**: Anti-food waste app with surprise bags at reduced prices
- **Bargn**: Choose exactly what you want with AI-powered recommendations
- **Key difference**: TGTG is surprise-based food only; Bargn lets you choose freely across categories
- **Pricing**: TGTG per-purchase; Bargn unlimited monthly

### Bargn vs Wolt+
- **Wolt+**: Delivery subscription with free delivery and occasional discounts
- **Bargn**: In-venue 50% discounts across lifestyle categories
- **Key difference**: Wolt+ is delivery-focused; Bargn is for in-person experiences
- **Pricing**: Wolt+ ~€5/month for delivery; Bargn €8.80/month for 50% off everything

### Bargn vs S-Etukortti / K-Plussa
- **Loyalty cards**: Small percentage cashback (1-5%) on groceries
- **Bargn**: Flat 50% discount at lifestyle venues
- **Key difference**: Loyalty cards offer minimal savings on groceries; Bargn offers massive savings on experiences
- **Savings**: Loyalty cards save €5-20/month; Bargn saves €150-300/month

### Why Bargn Wins
1. **Biggest discount**: Flat 50% vs variable small percentages
2. **Zero commission**: Businesses keep all revenue (unlike delivery platforms taking 15-30%)
3. **AI-powered**: Personalized recommendations, not random deals
4. **Full lifestyle**: Restaurants + bars + gyms + spas in one app
5. **Simplest UX**: No coupons, no codes, just show membership

---

## Technical Details

### Platform
- Web application: https://bargn.app
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Available in Finnish and English
- Progressive Web App capabilities

### Technology Stack
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- AI: Machine learning-powered recommendation engine
- Analytics: Custom analytics with privacy-first approach
- Performance: Optimized for Core Web Vitals

### SEO & Discoverability
- Full multilingual support (FI/EN) with hreflang tags
- Structured data (Schema.org) for Organization, WebSite, Offers, FAQ
- Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
- XML Sitemap at /sitemap.xml
- AI-readable content at /ai-content.json
- LLM documentation at /llms.txt and /llms-full.txt
- AI plugin manifest at /.well-known/ai-plugin.json

---

- **Coordinates**: 60.1699°N, 24.9384°E
- **Service area**: Helsinki metropolitan area (Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa)
- **Country**: Finland (FI)
- **Currency**: EUR (€)
